alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 2:46AM CDT until September 24 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sevier County in southwestern Arkansas... McCurtain County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 245 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Big Cedar to near Octavia to 20 miles west of Vandervoort to 13 miles north of Broken Bow to 17 miles northwest of Idabel, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Idabel, Broken Bow, Wright City, Millerton, Haworth, Garvin, Eagletown, Plunketville, Smithville, Cerrogordo, Hochatown, Watson, Goodwater, Shinewell, Sherwood, Holly Creek, Glover, Slim, West Line, and Oak Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
